subject: Your customer has been accepted for finance

rows.text: Your customer has been accepted for finance for their Howdens purchase, they have selected a deposit amount of {{deposit.applied}}, so you will need to collect this directly from your customer.
{{extras.branch.trading_name}} will now process the order, we will update you once the goods are marked as delivered to the customers address.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at support@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911.
